allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json for line in sys.stdin: try: obj = json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''assistant'': msg = obj.get\(''message'', {}\) content = msg.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(''ASSISTANT TEXT:'', c[''text''][:500]\) elif isinstance\(content, str\): print\(''ASSISTANT TEXT:'', content[:500]\) elif obj.get\(''type''\) == ''human'': msg = obj.get\(''message'', {}\) content = msg.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(''HUMAN TEXT:'', c[''text''][:500]\) elif isinstance\(content, str\): print\(''HUMAN TEXT:'', content[:500]\) except: pass ")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json for line in sys.stdin: try: obj = json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''human'': msg = obj.get\(''message'', {}\) content = msg.get\(''content'', ''''\) if isinstance\(content, list\): for c in content: if isinstance\(c, dict\) and c.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(''---HUMAN---''\) print\(c[''text''][:2000]\) elif isinstance\(content, str\): print\(''---HUMAN---''\) print\(content[:2000]\) except: pass ")
